main event: A pilot and controller reported seeing a bright, greenish object burst vertically and break into several pieces like flak over Texas in 1952.
interesting points: The object was spotted at an elevation of 20-30 degrees in the southeast sky.
The object burst vertically and broke into several pieces before fading away.
The sighting was initially reported as a possible anti-aircraft artillery burst.
The pilot of a C-46 aircraft also reported seeing the object while flying at 6,000 feet.
The sighting was investigated by the 34th NORAD Division Combat Center, but no activities in the area could account for the sighting.
sighted object: a bright, greenish object that burst vertically and broke into several pieces
photographs: no, there are no photographs present in the report
